name: Final Orbit: Nokia 3310 edition
description:
Created for the Nokia 3310 Jam

Final Orbit: Nokia 3310 edition, based on my exciting sci-fi survival shooter, Final Orbit! Now with all the best restrictions of everyone's favourite wireless communication device.

You are Earth's last line of defense against a barrage of space debris. Defend the planet for as long as you can while we evacuate the population using specially designed evac pods.  We'll be evacuating the human race 100 at a time.

You will die. At least you'll die a hero.

How to play:

Use the left and right cursor keys to navigate your Earth defense satelite.

Press Z to fire your missiles.

Press ESC to open the menu. Press ENTER to make a selection.

Earth's condition is tracked by the bar at the top of your HUD.

Your ammo is tracked by marks in the lower right corner.

Launch evac pods from the menu to save people.

Best of luck, Captain!
